basics.name: Ting Xu
basics.label: Engineer and Music Technologist
basics.summary: An innovative engineer and music technologist passionate about combining music and technology to solve real-world challenges, including applications in cochlear implant sound processing and human-computer interaction.

work.name: Byte Carnival LLC
work.summary: Developed innovative solutions for AI tool integration and enhanced technical workflows for global clients.
highlights: Developed a GPT-based knowledge bot to address hallucination issues in language models.
Provided strategic insights to legal teams for STEM-related compliance and regulatory projects.

work.name: Varsity Tutors Inc.
work.summary: Tutored college students and professionals in STEM topics and developed tailored learning plans.
highlights: Delivered customized lessons in Mathematics, Physics, and Computer Science.
Designed personalized strategies to improve academic performance.

work.name: Washington University in St. Louis
work.summary: Streamlined campus-wide technology support and developed automated tools for project management.
highlights: Reduced travel distances through optimized routing for tech support.
Automated pricing inquiries using Python and Selenium.

volunteer.summary: Facilitated cultural exchanges and internships for international students.
highlights: Organized onboarding for overseas interns and coordinated cultural events.
Matched candidates with international opportunities, improving stakeholder communication.

awards.title: Scholarship for Foreign Students in Natural and Engineering Sciences
awards.summary: Awarded for exceptional academic performance in engineering sciences.

projects.name: Cochlear Implant Simulator
projects.description: Simulated cochlear implant performance in noisy environments to analyze auditory responses and optimize sound processing for users.
highlights: Implemented a Python-based tool using Librosa.
Evaluated noise reduction algorithms for auditory enhancement.

projects.name: A Metronome Using TENS Unit
projects.description: Developed a rhythm guidance tool for musicians using Raspberry Pi, TENS technology, and AWS IoT.
highlights: Created an embedded system to stimulate muscle rhythm for better timing.
Pioneered a novel approach in music performance technology.
